title: Font ID requested
content:
Thanks for any assistance that you can offer IDing these fonts.

In file 1.jpg, looking for the font name for “SCENE D’AMOUR” and also white type “JANVIER 2006 – 20H30”.

Looking for fonts in other 3 files as well.

Thanks so much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5853.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_5318.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_4879.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_5244.jpg)
author: jjdewtt

comments.content:
Aesthetic Apparatus sans is [Stratum](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/process_type_foundry/stratum_1_ot/?&sample_text=APPARATUS&sample_size=48).  
Binifadet could be a customized [Giza](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/families/giza/?&sample_text=BINIFADET&sample_size=48).  
For “parenthesaurbaine” you might like [Naiv](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/naiv_ot/?&sample_text=parenthesaurbaine&sample_size=48).

“AESTHETIC” should be [Jukebox Hellenic Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849/http:/www.identifont.com/list?2+hellenic+1+PEE+234+OOZ+82+OP0+0) by jason Wallcott (or [Baseline Fonts 58 Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090822030849/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/)...)
